Tucson nodds and opens an energy port leading directly into his left wrist.=
  

"Yes, that sounds good Lord Elder.  Here, this will make it easy to adm=
inister the energon." 

He takes a seat near everyone but especially near E=
lita.  Rodimus and Nightlight were already taken from her and he was not ab=
out to let her fall into the same fate.  Her sadness to him is a torture he=
 felt she did not deserve.  She had done nothing to no one and in return wa=
s suffering a great deal.  This angers him yet he tries desperately to hold=
 back his elevating temper.  He cracks his knuckles to try and calm himself=
 down although at this point, he didn't know if he could ever calm down.

"=
As if the battle between us and Unicron wasn't enough. Now Hydras, Cyclonus=
 and Scourge have to go on a meaningless power trip and torment innocent Au=
tobots and Maximals without rime or reason.  I know if Rodimus were in his =
right mind, he would not tolerate it, and certainly not Optimus.  As far as=
 I heard from what I learned while at the fortress, Cyclonus is feeding off=
 the power of the Matrix which is in Rodimus's body.  That's what's making =
him stronger.  Well, guess what?  I'm prepared to cut that umbilcal cord no=
 matter how much it damages my own spark.  I learned something about self w=
orth.  What am I worth?  How can I be worth something when there are lives =
just starting out there that are more precious than my own?  And how can I =
say I'm worth something when we have young aspiring Autobots and Maximals j=
ust starting their careers as soldiers?  They have their whole lives ahead =
of them, and by Primus I'm prepared to give back what's been taken from the=
m, THEIR FREEDOM!"

He sighs and calms himself down.

" When it comes down =
to it, there is no such thing as self worth.  There is only wealth if it ca=
n be shared with others.  If we extend our hands to help another, it helps =
a world to grow stronger, and strength is what is worth more than anything =
in the universe, and that strength only derives from compassion and love.  =
This is something they lack.  They have everything else, except the most po=
werful force in the universe.  We won't need any super charged weaponry to =
fight them.  For the most part, just look inside your heart, and you will f=
ind the strength to overcome any evil that's thrown out at you."  

He paus=
es for a moment.

"Optimus Prime believed in such values.  He cared deeply =
for those he fought for.  And it was that compassion that lead to many of h=
is successful battles." 

As he sat with everyone, Tucson is instinctively =
drawn back to the body of Optimus Prime as he turns his head in the directi=
on of his body.  The cable he connects to the energon flow appears long eno=
ugh for him to walk a reasonable distance, as he finds himself going back t=
o Optimus Prime's still body.

"Sorry for being so wrestless, but something=
 is telling me to come back to Optimus Prime's body..."

Once again, he kne=
els beside his fallen leader, feeling that maybe he had not spent enough ti=
me paying his tribute.  Then, another overpowering instinct compells him to=
 put his palm over Prime's chest.  He could feel an energy source, which pe=
rplexes him into curiosity.  Touching nothing he keeps his hand over Prime'=
s chest.

"Kup, Elita, Lord Elder, over here.. I - feel something...  Can't=
 quite put my finger on what it is, but I do feel something.  It's undernea=
th my hand.  It's an energy source, a - very powerful energy source... Mayb=
e I - shouldn't be this close..."  

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston=
 Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> > Elita started to cry in silence w=
hile Kup Hugged her tightly.
> 
> Lord Elder looked over at Elita, his own =
heart troubled by her tears.
> However he was never good with dealing with =
young ones. He could deal
> with scientific and engineering formula all day=
. He could even run
> through combat to save an innocent, but the crying of=
 a young one
> seemed beyond his ability to deal with.
> 
> He glanced at K=
up, silently asking him to deal with Elita as he helped
> Tuscon to sit. "P=
erhaps we get can get you a feed line as we all
> talk?" he said to Tuscon,=
 trying to cover up his own feelings of
> unease.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
